result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joseph Fuentes

records.addlTxt: Case set for status of counsel 11/10/2022 at 8:30am. Attorney Graber has been appointed. The next date will be 11/30/2022 at 8:30am for a preliminary hearing in Br. PE. Parties are notified by email.

Defendant Joseph Fuentes appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Thomas Hasle in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for status of counsel. SPD has not appointed an Attorney. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for status of counsel in Branch PE. Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Joseph Fuentes not in court, in custody in HOC. Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Preliminary Hearing. State's Witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Case is adjourned. Court orders case adjourned for CAUSE for a Status of Counsel.
Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms. Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Joseph Fuentes appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Christopher John Ertl appeared by video for Joseph Fuentes.  Attorney Gregg Herman appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10. Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 2. 
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Joseph Fuentes not in court.  Kimberly Dorice Schoepp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. The forfeiture order is stayed for 30 days pending notice to the defendant. Court makes a finding that there is no possible victim identified, therefore, restitution is not an issue.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 05/05/2022@2:30pm
